mapper.select: SELECT board_no,subject,member_id,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,board_cate_no,num FROM (SELECT board_no,subject,member_id,regdate,hit,board_cate_no,rownum as num FROM (SELECT board_no,subject,member_id,regdate,hit,board_cate_no FROM board ORDER BY board_no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(board_no)+1,1) as board_no FROM board
INSERT INTO board( board_no, member_id, subject, content, regdate, hit, board_cate_no ) VALUES( #{board_no}, #{member_id}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, #{board_cate_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no,subject,member_id,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,board_cate_no,num FROM (SELECT board_no,subject,member_id,regdate,hit,board_cate_no,rownum as num FROM (SELECT board_no,subject,member_id,regdate,hit,board_cate_no FROM board WHERE board_cate_no=#{board_cate_no} ORDER BY board_no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
